links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Devices Prove To Have A Very Long Life With Owners
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has long had a reputation for producing high-quality hardware, and now we have some concrete numbers to back up just how long its products last with their owners.

links.title: Apple Continues To Dominate The Smartphone Profit Pool
links.description: I cover technology companies, worldwide economies and the stock market Opinions expressed by Forbes Contributors are their own. Investors and analysts tend to be concerned that Apple's iPhone lags Google's Android smartphones substantially in unit market share. While any product needs to sell enough to be viable, the other side of the equation is the device's profitability.
